apple_vendor_description: This emoji, depicting a woman and man holding hands with medium-dark and medium skin tones respectively, is beautifully rendered on Apple devices with Appleâ€™s signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The hands are depicted with gentle curvature and subtle shading, conveying warmth and connection with a tangible, 3D quality. On Apple devices, this emoji powerfully symbolizes partnership, love, unity, and the diversity of human relationships, often used to express romantic feelings or a strong bond between two individuals.
